Producer: Sam Slater, Paul Bernon, Marcus Cox, Karrie Cox, Nick Kroll, Jared Goldman
Production Co: Duplass Brothers, Through Films, Burn Later Prods.
Synopsis: A self-absorbed, failed entrepreneur (Nick Kroll) moves in with his estranged sister (Rose Byrne) and brother-in-law (Bobby Cannavale) and becomes his 3-year-old nephew's nanny.
Title: Adult Beginners
